Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuver
Traits.Content: Springer, Jack can add his DEX modifier to his AC against one melee attack that he can see, provided he isn't incapacitated.

Traits.Name: Fearsome Presence
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Springer, Jack must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Springer, Jack makes two Claw Swipe attacks.

Actions.Name: Claw Swipe
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (7d8 + 5) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Blue Flame Burst (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: Springer, Jack exhales a 20-foot cone of blue flames. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are also ignited, taking 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of their turns for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns to extinguish the flames.

Actions.Name: Dread Leap
Actions.Content: Springer, Jack vaults up to 30 feet into the air and lands on a target. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of the landing point must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn. Additionally, the target of his landing takes 30 (6d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is frightened, the damage increases to 40 (8d8 + 3).
